approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings stored on the LTF NFS server. This manual process is time-consuming and inefficient. This project aims to streamline the process.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard shall be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal shall be provided to V-KYC team leads and Process Managers.
All V-KYC recordings shall be available on the portal.
Recordings shall be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings shall be searchable by date and month.
Users shall be able to upload a file (Excel or text) with up to 50 LAN IDs for bulk download.
The system shall process the uploaded file and trigger a backend API call.
Results of the bulk download request shall be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table shall display 10 records per page.
Only 10 records shall be downloaded at a time during bulk download.
The access to the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)

functional_requirements: Search functionality by date and month.
Bulk download functionality via file upload (CSV/TXT).
Display of recording details in a tabular format.
Download All option for bulk downloads.
success_criteria: V-KYC recordings are readily accessible to authorized users.
Reduced dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
Improved efficiency in retrieving recordings for audit purposes.
User satisfaction with the portal's usability.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF NFS server.
Maximum 50 LAN IDs per file upload.
Table pagination will display only 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records at a time will be downloaded.
assumptions: The LTF NFS server is accessible.
The backend API for processing requests is available.
The necessary infrastructure for the portal exists or will be provided.
risks: Network connectivity issues affecting access to the NFS server.
API failures during bulk download processing.
Data security and privacy concerns related to recording access.

recommendations: Include non-functional requirements such as performance and security.
Specify the data retention policy for recordings.
Define error handling and logging mechanisms.

recommendations_for_completion: Specify security requirements (e.g., access controls, encryption).
Detail error handling and logging mechanisms.
